name: Tetris [GMS2]
description:
This is a free Tetris clone made in GameMaker Studio 2. 

If you wish, you can purchase the source code and art for the game.

The source code is also available as a package in the GameMaker Marketplace: Tetris[GMS2]

The music and sound effects used in the game are not included in the purchase of the source code, as they were not created by me. You can find them at:

  • Music by: Abstraction
  • SFX by:  Little Robot Sound Factory 

If you could rate or leave a comment, I would really appreciate it!
